jobTitle: Assistant Manager/Deputy Manager - Environment, Health and Safety (EHS)
jobContext: Coordinate and conduct Central HS Training Program for management, non-management and contractor personnel.Coordinate and conduct Gap Analysis, Risk Assessment and Develop Actions Plan and Follow up in accordance to the Company Standard and Advisory requirements.Assess, develop and distribute HS signage and posters for site and keep continuous liaison with different operation In-charges, Safety Professionals, Engineers & Contractors for bringing better visibility and awareness related to EHS Issues throughout the company.Participate in the internal audits according to develop internal audit schedule and follow up the recommended actions for proper and timely implementation.Prepare different Reports for this company on a weekly, monthly and quarterly basis and coordinate and follow up internal reporting from sites to maintain a smooth central reporting system.Ensure full compliance on reviewed standards Work at Heights (confirm no major WAH gaps exist at site), steel process hazards and energy isolation along with Safe electrical work practices.Establish HAZCOM by completing gap analysis and action implementation.Conduct site auditing for application of Reward and Discipline matrix.Extent SLDP model locations by developing new area ownership and full implementation and ensure sustainability of the current model locations as per guideline.Maintain the Database System for incidents and accidents and follow up the action status for proper completion for reducing the reoccurrence of the unwanted events and achieving the "Company Zero Accident Targets".Ensure routine and Non-routine visit to different operations to conduct HS inspections, investigations and act as a central support system in case of emergency crisis.Conduct Site Permit to Work auditing and find out improvement area on monthly basis to ensure the implementation of Reward and Disciplinary policy. jobContext:
HR ACTIVITIES -
Assist in Recruitment process
Conduct Joining procedure- communicate with selected candidate & confirm his/her joining. Provide check list. Collect require document according to check list. Provide offer letter, Appointment letter & confidential agreement and fill up.
Conduct Orientation program -Describe TVL Organogram, HR & Admin activities, Policies, Forms & company rules, eligibility of benefits.
Assist in employee separation procedure- providing & describing clearance form. Check & Complete proper clearance procedure.
Drafting Different types of letter: Appointment letter, confirmation letter, Deed of Agreement, Training Deed, Increment letter, Show cause (Partially) etc.
Conduct any operational activities with GP -Internet activation, Roaming, Sim replace, GP tracker, Welcome tune active/ deactivation, incoming/ outgoing call on / off, network and other problem etc.
Cooperate employee Health & Safety team to reinstruct new health policy.
Maintaining Leave management -receive leave form through checking, input leave status into leave database & form, provide monthly leave report to Admin. Calculate yearly earn leave balance & send approved copy to finance.
Maintenance of Database: Mobile, Bag, Joining, Separation, Promotion, insurance, Leave etc.
Prepare & circulation of Memo:
Assist in appraisal process- provide & collect appraisal form to the employee, Check & input the information in the form with HR Data and handed over the form to Appraisal Committee.
Assist in employee confirmation process- count probation period and provide confirmation appraisal form. Provide confirmation letter, after guarantor checking & agreement signing complete confirmation process.
Organize different meeting: Weekly, Monthly, Quarter and Annual Meeting.
Prepare meeting Agenda & Minutes on weekly basis.
Maintenance of employee personal file-
Maintenance of Agreement - Employee agreement, Training deed, Physicists Agreement.
Maintain Physicists contract record - renew contract and prepare agreement.
Prepare invitation letter
Maintain TVL Employee list by GOOGLE DOCS.
Training and Management- search suitable training from different training center and send our employee to participate (for Local Training)
Prepare yearly organogram- Compile yearly wing wise business plan.
Assist to all kind of reporting as per requirement basis.
Correspondent with GP, BD jobs & other related vendor.
Do any task assign by the management.
ADMIN ACTIVITIES -
Vehicle Servicing & record keeping - ©
Logistic Support (Mobile Set, Sim Card, Bag, insurance card) - ©
Money receipt keeping (Mobile, bag- Original/ Photocopy) after checking through Finance.
Foreign Tour Approval Form (FTA) Partial -©
Record keeping & renewal of company's enlistment certificate, membership, agreement etc.
VISA and ticket processing
Correspondent with foreign Principle for Agreement.
Keep & update foreign principles agreement record.
Printing-TVL pad, File, Leave Form, Convince, Bill, Cash Requisition
jobDescription: HR ACTIVITIES -
educationalReq: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in HRM, Master of Business Administration (MBA) in HRM

jobTitle: Assistant Manager/ Deputy Manager - Environment, Health and Safety (EHS)
jobContext:
Coordinate and conduct Central HS Training Program for management, non-management and contractor personnel.
Coordinate and conduct Gap Analysis, Risk Assessment and Develop Actions Plan and Follow up in accordance to the Company Standard and Advisory requirements.
Assess, develop and distribute HS signage and posters for site and keep continuous liaison with different operation In-charges, Safety Professionals, Engineers & Contractors for bringing better visibility and awareness related to EHS Issues throughout the company.
Participate in the internal audits according to develop internal audit schedule and follow up the recommended actions for proper and timely implementation.
Prepare different Reports for this company on a weekly, monthly and quarterly basis and coordinate and follow up internal reporting from sites to maintain a smooth central reporting system.
Ensure full compliance on reviewed standards Work at Heights (confirm no major WAH gaps exist at site), steel process hazards and energy isolation along with Safe electrical work practices.
Establish HAZCOM by completing gap analysis and action implementation.
Conduct site auditing for application of Reward and Discipline matrix.
Extent SLDP model locations by developing new area ownership and full implementation and ensure sustainability of the current model locations as per guideline.
Maintain the Database System for incidents and accidents and follow up the action status for proper completion for reducing the reoccurrence of the unwanted events and achieving the "Company Zero Accident Targets".
Ensure routine and Non-routine visit to different operations to conduct HS inspections, investigations and act as a central support system in case of emergency crisis.
Conduct Site Permit to Work auditing and find out improvement area on monthly basis to ensure the implementation of Reward and Disciplinary policy. Also help the area owners to complete the assigned tasks.
Deliver Annual Health and Safety plan and monitor actions, obtain quarterly review of the plan approved by the Managing Director.
Facilitate HS Committee meeting and keep minutes of the meeting and follow up of actions for close the CAP.
To ensure EHS compliance as per law and standard.
To ensure IMS standard and face internal and external IMS audit.
Facilitate improvement in Job Safety Analysis (Risk Assessment) involving contractor workers in terms of Task observation, review of existing risk assessment, improve the work instructions and establish a standard document for job briefing for all routine and non-routine jobs.
Maintain interface with the Fire Wardens, First Aiders and Security Focal Point, Emergency Evacuation (Office), Fire Drills, Security Drills, First Aid and Medevac.
Encourage reporting Unsafe Acts and Unsafe Condition (UAC)
Keep track of Unsafe Act and Condition reported by employees and contractor personnel, and keep record and follow up actions.
Keep record of all safety alerts and follow up of actions.
Review safety requirements for issuance of Permit to Work (PTW) for all safety critical activities.
Environmental sustainability and compliance monitoring.
jobDescription: Coordinate and conduct Central HS Training Program for management, non-management and contractor personnel.
educationalReq: Bachelor degree in any discipline

jobContext:
Concern Worldwide is an international, humanitarian organisation dedicated to the reduction of suffering and working towards the ultimate elimination of extreme poverty in the world`s poorest countries. We believe in a world where no one lives in poverty, fear or oppression; where all have access to a decent standard of living and the opportunities and choices essential to a long, healthy and creative life; a world where everyone is treated with dignity and respect.
Concern Worldwide, Bangladesh is looking for a suitable candidate for the following position:
Type of Contract: Five (05) Years Fixed Term Contract
Duty Station:	Head Office, Dhaka, Bangladesh
Job Purpose: The Admin and Logistics specialist will have responsibility to ensure efficient support for managing the administrative duties, which includes over all fleet management, asset and inventory management, lease agreements, event management in efficient, standard and cost effective manner.
Also responsible to ensuring national and international staff and visitors are provided with all necessary support to enable them to work for Concern in Bangladesh including arranging visas, accommodation and travel arrangement following standard safety and security including dealing with Ministry SB & NSI, as per Concern Worldwide policy and procedures.
jobDescription: Concern Worldwide is an international, humanitarian organisation dedicated to the reduction of suffering and working towards the ultimate elimination of extreme poverty in the world`s poorest countries. We believe in a world where no one lives in poverty, fear or oppression; where all have access to a decent standard of living and the opportunities and choices essential to a long, healthy and creative life; a world where everyone is treated with dignity and respect.

jobContext: To promote healthy labour-management practices;To look after the provision of amenities, such as canteen, shelters for rest, creche, adequate latrine facilities, drinking water, and the like;To keep co-ordination with the medical officer of the factory for better services and treatment of the workers;Maintaining good relationship with factory staff and workers;To bring to the notice of the management of the factory the grievance of workers; individual as well as collective, with a view to securing their expeditious redress;To watch industrial relations in the event of a dispute arising between the management of the factory and workers and to help to bring about a settlement through mutual discussion and joint consultation;To look after the welfare provisions, such as, housing facilities, supply of food stuffs, establishment of cooperative stores and fair price shops, social and recreational facilities, sanitation and advice on personnel problems and education of children;To suggest measure which will serve to raise the working and living conditions of the workers and promote their general well-being;Ensure all over welfare activities as per Bangladesh labor Law 2006 and Labor Rules 2015;Counselling workers on general issues (Company rules, regulations, policies, procedures and discipline;Prepare for any kind of compliance audit as per buyer COC & standard;
jobDescription: To promote healthy labour-management practices;
